resources.name: Bugcrowd University
resources.description: Modules with slides, videos and sometimes labs to learn web security

resources.name: GHDB
resources.description: Google Hacking Database; Collection of google dorks

resources.name: GTFOBins
resources.description: Curated list/cheatsheet of Unix binaries that can be exploited by an attacker to bypass local security restrictions, obtain shells, read files

resources.name: HTML5 Security Cheatsheet
resources.description: XSS vector making use of HTML5, HTML4, CSS, DOM, UFT7, SVG, JSON, etc ...

resources.name: LOLBAS
resources.description: Living Off The Land Binaries and Scripts; Curated list/cheatsheet of Windows binaries that can be exploited by an attacker to bypass local security restrictions, obtain shells, read files

resources.name: Malware Traffic Analysis
resources.description: Malware traffic analysis blog and pastebin posts with pcap and malware samples attached; traffic analysis exercises

resources.name: MD5 maxmin record
resources.description: Collection of various extremes of MD5 hashes

resources.name: Privacy Tools
resources.description: Website that provides knowledge and tools to protect your privacy against global mass surveillance

resources.name: PTES
resources.description: The penetration testing execution standard covers all steps related to a penetration test

resources.name: SSL Checklist for Pentesters (Explore Security)
resources.description: List of SSL/TLS checks that can be performed manually with OpenSSL or a web browser

resources.name: VRT
resources.description: Bugcrowd Vulnerability Rating Taxonomy (VRT) provides a baseline vulnerability priority scale for bug hunters and organizations
